description: The BR-34 Regional Transport Office serves as the District Transport Office (DTO) for Khagaria, Bihar, operating under the Munger Division. It manages vital transport services including vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and permit regulation for various types of commercial and private vehicles across the district's seven administrative blocks. The office is situated in the administrative heart of the district, playing a key role in maintaining transportation standards and safety in this flood-prone region.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar
